value.name: After 2 arrests, Lawrence police still searching for killer or killers in downtown shooting
value.description: Adam Heffley addresses media members Tuesday, Oct. 17, 2017 at the Lawrence Police Department's Investigations and Training Center, alongside chief assistant district attorney David Melton.

value.name: Police Blotter: Alert Customer Helps Retrieve 12-Pack Of Heineken From Thief; Officer Referees Dispute Over Feeding The Pigeons
value.description: Both cards were deactivated. David Melton of Networks Inc. on Nowlin Lane said an unknown white male driving a silver Jeep Compass used his vehicle to destroy the front doors of the business.
